name: Halloween (itch) (Armando Agra)
description:
Aim and shoot with mouse, move with WASD.

Shoot enemies  and watch out for their special abilites. A boss spawn every round! They're even more powerful!

Game was design and programmed by me

2D Art made by Raquel Avelino.

3D Art made by Iago Lunardy.

Soundtrack made by Victor Magno.

This game was for an Artificial Intelligence class in college (late 2018), and I worked on it for a few days, learning about AI and tweaking it.
